title: Is It Possible To Start a Business Debt-Free? (Hour 1)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Ken Coleman discuss:

Starting a debt-free business,

Disagreeing about what to do with a property,

Preparing financially to switch careers,


Support Our Sponsor:

DreamCloud

Churchill Mortgage

Zander Insurance


Want a plan for your money? Find out where to start: https://bit.ly/3nInETX
Listen to all The Ramsey Network podcasts: https://bit.ly/3GxiXm6
